title: ABOUT US
content: IIT Palakkad is proud to host its very first Techno-Cultural fest, Petrichor, on 27th, 28th October 2018.

‘Petrichor’ denotes the pleasant smell that accompanies the first rain after a long spell of warm weather. The invigorating joy evoked by the first rain signifies a new lease of life, the beginning a new chapter for IIT Palakkad. Our Techno-Cultural fest ‘Petrichor’ promises to BREAK THE LOOP of everyday monotony by establishing an annual national platform for students to showcase their creative genius and technical prowess.
